description_0: An indoor slightly downward angled view of a severely wilted Cyclamen Persicum plant placed inside of a dark colored cylindrical shaped pot, the plant consists of different shaded green leaves that are all hanging downward and appear to be dead, as well as light purple and white flowers that are hanging below the green leaves. The plant is resting on a white marble countertop with slight black detailing, there is a wall behind the plant that consists of the same marble, as well as white rectangular tiles.
description_1: An upper-angle view of a potted plant with Peperomia caperata plants with brown coconut fibers inside, indoors. The clay pot is a rusty orange color with a circular base at the bottom that is filled with water. The plant has purple-green leaves with short stems, and the fibers act to cover the soil. The pot is over a white marble hard surface, next to a corner with ceramic brick walls and a white wooden panel on the right. A partial view of a white light switch is in the top left corner. A soft shadow of the plant casts to the wooden panel.
